function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of aerosols in air-conditioned spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of cross-infection and disease spread","Mitigation":"Increase air change per hour, optimize air supply rates, and control ceiling fan speeds","Technologies":"HVAC system modifications, air quality sensors, and smart HVAC controls","People":"Occupants of air-conditioned spaces","Owner":"HVAC engineers and building managers"}]}
